scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i themes/sigmund/styles/styles.css -o themes/sigmund/static/styles/styles.css; zola build
scripts.watch: concurrently "npx tailwindcss -i themes/sigmund/styles/styles.css -o themes/sigmund/static/styles/styles.css --watch" "zola serve -i 0.0.0.0 -u macbook"

name: videah-blog
description: seemed like a good idea at the time
